Jamhuriya University of Science & Technology (JUST) is a private, higher educational
institution providing quality education to the public.

ABOUT US

JUST - Jamhuriya University of Science & Technology is the Home of Quality Education in Somalia, providing almost ten
undergraduate specializations in the fields of Medicine, Economics & Management, Engineering and Computer Science.
The university set a record of student enrollment in the first and the second semesters of
its existence for all local local universities, enrolling more than 500 students.
